amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for Amtrak by $106 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding (by transfer) for Operating Grants to the National Railroad Passenger Corporation account by $106,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bachmann amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 110 - 308 (Roll no. 692).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A003) offered by Mrs. Bachmann.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
